content: A new proposal has been announced: Disallow keywords and macro arguments names #68. It will be announced at the next meeting to try and draw attention to it, but usually MCPs are not discussed during triage meetings. If you think this would benefit from discussion amongst the team, consider proposing a design meeting.

...and of course only now do I notice the typo in the title.

s/ and / as /
There's some more information about this at https://github.com/rust-lang/reference/pull/863. I suspect this was an unintentional change due to #39419.

I updated the subject, which caused the next message to go into a new stream. Cross-referencing: https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/243200-t-lang.2Fmajor-changes/topic/Disallow.20keywords.20as.20macro.20arguments.20names.20lang-team.2368
